reviews.title: Knowledgeable guide and entertaining trip
text: this tour is absolutely worth the money. The tour left on time. We didn't have many people on board but the lady who was making the commentary was amazing. I didn't get her name but she was great. She had so much information of the islands and the history and the CN tower . I took the 7pm tour so it was around sunset and it was absolutely beautiful. I highly recommend this tour

reviews.title: A fresh perspective on Toronto
text: My husband felt queazy with the boat‚Äôs movement üòèThat being said, the views of Toronto‚Äôs harbour skyline were unbroken and beautiful. The commentary was excellent: knowledgeable and good humoured. We were both impressed by the amount of information about the waterfront and its history, effortlessly imparted.

reviews.title: Solo Trip Actitivy
text: Very enjoyable and informative way to spend an hour if you're in theHarbourside area. Got some amazing views of the city and some great historical facts about Toronto. Our captain was super amusing!

reviews.title: Fun one hour cruise tour on comfortable boat
text: Very comprehensive tour with excellent (and funny) tour guide (not sure of the spelling but I think he said his name was Jerrod).

reviews.title: Useful and Informative Tour
text: A very interesting and informative tour around the waterfront and islands provided with humour by. Captain Lucus. Well worth doing.

reviews.title: A very entertaining cruise
text: The tour guide was exceptionally entertaining.  The monologue was filled with a great many facts plus lots of humour.  There are some very stunning views of Toronto and the islands during the tour.  This is a great way to get off your feet for an hours and have lots of fun.  Highly recommended!

reviews.title: Skyline with the Ladies
text: Captain Isobel and first mate Sam were incredible from start to finish. The narration by Sam was both informative and delivered with humour. So refreshing to do a tour led by two young ladies who really added to the experience. The skyline was magical, better than Manhattan and an absolute must do tour. Thank you for adding to our wonderful vacation!!! Strongly recommend.

reviews.title: Well worth it...on a foggy afternoon!
text: This Harbourfront tour was very informative, slow paced and well worth the one hour journey around the harbour, the views of the beautiful Toronto skyline from the lake is spectacular.

Prior to taking this tour I wouldn't have known they were Toronto Islands and learn a lot along the way, though a fog came over on the beginning of our tour at 2:00pm almost put a damper on things, it cleared up eventually and I got those much needed shots, thanks to our Captain Kathy....A highly recommended tour for an affordable price.

reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic üòç
text: This Toronto Harbor cruise was absolutely fantastic! The views were breathtaking, offering stunning scenery of the city and its surroundings. Our guide, Abir, was truly exceptional‚Äîfull of energy and engaging with all the passengers, which made the experience incredibly fun and memorable. The captain ‚ÄúSam‚Äù was highly skilled, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable ride from start to finish. I couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better tour. Highly recommended!

reviews.title: Well worth it.
text: A very good, comprehensive tour. Just long enough and not too long. Nice narration with a bit of humour by Catain Katie. Well worth the $37.50.

reviews.title: Relaxing Harbour Cruise
text: Lovely, informative, relaxing cruise around the harbour & Toronto Islands.
All the crew were professional & friendly.
A great way to see the sights of city.

reviews.title: This was fun . . .
text: This was a fun tour, even though it was cloudy and threatening rain.  The guide had very interesting information and a fine sense of humor.

reviews.title: Excellent Employees - A Local Company Worth Supporting!
text: As a past employee here, I cannot emphasize how great this local company is! Dan and Brian provide young ambitious individuals an opportunity to experience a high responsibility position with thorough training by highly experienced industry professionals like Rob, Sean, Caroline, Alexia. Impeccable attention to safety protocols, the safety training is above satisfactory, the drill skills are even admired when transferred to ocean going vessels. Respectful to employees and fair employment practices which is highly needed in Toronto. I wish I could have worked here longer if I had stayed in Toronto. 100% an amazing local business with a friendly team of staff - Toronto Harbour Tours deserves all the love and support! Grateful for their impact!

reviews.title: 5/5 : Best skyline view.
text: Really nice crew, perfect view. Very good experience, I recommend. This is the best way to see the skyline and discover about Toronto‚Äôs history.

reviews.title: It was the views for me
text: The views were amazing and John 's narration was great. I really enjoyed this tour and the price was very reasonable.

reviews.title: Awesome Toronto Boat Tour
text: Our tour guide and boat captain did an excellent job. Very funny and informative (I love to learn about the places I visit) . Highly recommend and bring cash for a tip! Well worth it.

reviews.title: Toronto and islands cruise.
text: Toronto and islands cruise. Light hearted and informative commentary was good. Value for money. Lovely day. Thank you

reviews.title: A captivating hour
text: This was an excellent, unrushed tour - not only of Toronto harbour, but also of the islands, which are especially beautiful. Captain Will's commentary was informative, funny and totally absorbing. Highly recommended!

reviews.title: Amazing boat tour.
text: Wow if the first thing that comes to mind when I think of this tour.  The tour guide and the captain were amazing.  The pics you will get from Toronto harbor are amazing.  This boat tour is so well done.  They depart on time and arrive back in port in an hour.  It goes by so quickly we even thought of doing it again the next day as we enjoyed it so very much.  If you get the opportunity to do this tour you will not be disappointed.

reviews.title: Awesome tour!
text: The Harbor Tour was the highlight of our trip! Cassidy and Abir were the ideal guides - so funny and knowledgeable! The views were great, 1-hour was the perfect length of time, and the boat wasn't as cold as we feared (it's pretty well enclosed).

reviews.title: Outstanding Experience
text: I thoroughly enjoyed this wonderful boat ride off of downtown Toronto.  Jonathan and the other captain (I forgot her name) did an outstanding job of pointing out the highlights and making the ride interesting but also did talk too much.  It is a wonderful way to spend an hour while seeing some Toronto highlights.

reviews.title: Awful experience!
text: I took this cruise in 2023 with my daughter and it was fabulous, so we decided to do it again this summer with my son.  My most recent cruise was awful! The boat has changed and it‚Äôs no longer a pontoon type of boat with open sides and a nice breeze to be felt on the water. Today my boat ride was disappointing for numerous reasons. There‚Äôs absolutely NO ventilation of any type on this boat and no basic fans to help move the air. To make matters worse, the window opposite us didn‚Äôt open so there was no cross breeze where we were sitting. Plus as an added bonus an extra staff member, I believe in his break took the ride with the two others who were working, (boat captain and guide) and he blocked the window / door on his front side of the boat the entire ride to keep himself cool while the rest of us had to deal with the heat.  NOT acceptable!!!!

The commentator last year was fabulous. He really engaged the guests and told us so much about the area.  Today, the guide was just ok, but there was so much missing that my daughter and I remembered from our 2023 ride.

The Toronto harbour is always a great place to visit. It‚Äôs best enjoyed on a beautiful summer day.  I will think twice about taking a boat ride on an enclosed boat like this in the future. I truly would have enjoyed a bigger pontoon type of boat, with room to stand up, perhaps walk around and take pictures, and of course feel the breeze.  This boat felt like a bus and it didn‚Äôt offer any of these things.

reviews.title: Great little tour
text: A great tour with a friendly, fun and informative guide. Loved the views of Toronto skyline and the cruise and history of the islands. Liked the small single level boat.  Very helpful staff to manage the wheelchair

reviews.title: Great way to see the Toronto skyline!
text: Great way to spend an hour and see the city skyline from the water!  Very informative narration and friendly staff!  Relaxing! Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Amazing views, informative and fun
text: Amazing trip, very friendly and funny staff. Recommended to others in our group from the UK who also went! Informative and fun!

reviews.title: Great boat trip
text: Enjoyable boat trip. With numerous commentary by the young lad. Good to see the Toronto sky line from the lake. Didn‚Äôt take too long

reviews.title: Great views of skyline
text: This was a fun tour with great views of the skyline. The tour guide was fairly well informed and pleasant. It was a hot day and when the boat was in motion it helped us feel more comfortable. When we slowed to a stop one older gentleman appeared to suffer heat stroke so we headed back to port ahead of schedule.

reviews.title: Great tour of the harbour
text: Great tour of the harbour and a must do on a visit to Toronto. Informative commentary as well, which was really helpful. Overall a good value experience.

reviews.title: Awesome Toronto Harbor Tour
text: I had a great time on this tour. The boat offered unobstructed view of the Toronto skyline and the islands. The weather cooperated, and I took lots of pictures. The guide was both knowledgeable and entertaining. Good value for money.

reviews.title: Fab cruise
text: Absolutely loved the trip with lots of information given and good sense of humour. The guides were so much fun would definitely recommend.

reviews.title: Very Good short trip
text: Great trip full of information and humour , very Knowledgeable tour guide I would recommend this trip for interest and make you smile

reviews.title: Informative and enjoyable tour
text: An enjoyable and informative tour. Knowledgeable friendly guides and captains. Good photo ops. Learnt about the history and architecture of the city and  harbour islands

reviews.title: Great trip
text: Great hour long trip around Toronto harbour that was relaxing and informative. The tour guide was funny and gave out lots of information about Toronto and the harbour area. Fantastic views of the skyline from the boat.

reviews.title: Fantastic views of Toronto skyline
text: This was a nice cruise with fantastic views of the Toronto skyline. Went around the islands. Had a hood tour guide. It was fun and relaxing.

reviews.title: Trip on lake
text: Great little trip very informative beautiful views and nice to see young ones running it.They were great.would do it again

reviews.title: Toronto Harbour Tour !
text: Great tour and lovely view of the city got some nice pictures too ,I would recommend this to have a wholesome view of Toronto !

reviews.title: fun day
text: my kids loved this! it is a great experience for children as well as adults! reasonably priced and makes a great family outing!

reviews.title: Tourists At Home
text: We thoroughly enjoyed our tour! Captain Neve expertly manoeuvred the boat, safely around the harbour. We appreciated her funny touches of humour in response to our excellent guide, Asef. He was very natural and friendly, providing information with humour and ease at a relaxed pace. I want to do it again!

reviews.title: A great time!
text: The tour guides were very knowledgeable and friendly! Had a great relaxing time going through the Toronto Harbour all while learning some cool history. Definitely recommend!

reviews.title: Nice Cruise and views
text: The narrator was full of information about the Toronto area and he was also funny.  Great photo ops of the skyline from the boat.
